638790.name: Lux umbra - Season Pass
638790.description:
In "Lux Umbra" they explore a confused world. They do not know why you here are what all that has to mean and how they come here out. They are able to do themselves only ventures they gain an accident had and now strongly have headaches. But so properly also do not know it. In "Lux Umbra" it concerns a fuller simulator mixed with other subjects like horror, adventure and a lot more. dip, into a secret full world.

SEASON PASS
Extend your fun with Season Pass.
Get new story sections with new content and with lots of new rims.

release

The new content is published in several episodes.
So every customer has always new content and we can thus listen to your feedback.
New content is published in several intervals. So every customer has time to play the new content.
There will be up to 4 episodes giving the several new missions ready for you.

content

New story missions
New worlds to explore
New sections
New story content
Extend your game in many new Playful content!

Note
The new content is based on the main game. But will add some new things.
Or even change. We recommend to play the main game through. And access the new content later.
